title: LeaverBuster
body: You guys present the problem and still leave in leavebuster to make us wait on queue's. Really?

replies.body:
When we realized there was an issue impacting our servers, we disabled ranked play in order to prevent ranked matches from being disconnected. A fix has been implemented, and you can stay updated on our post [**here**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/3Lmbjp8Y-3132017-na-server-issues). 

Rest assured that we're working to remedy any lasting effects this may have had for you!

It's great you are aware of and have mostly fixed the connection issues; but what are you doing about compensating the hundreds or even thousands of players that have lost LP, promos, etc? The problem persisted now for about 12 hours -- the whole day -- and not once was loss prevention enabled. Where is the compensation for those of us who had our time and efforts wasted and lost a lot of ranked game progress due to an error on your end?
Same problem here. and they say they are a community based game
